0.1.name: wordpress/reviewpress
0.1.description:
ReviewPress, a plugin for easier writing and managing reviews on your WordPress based weblog or website.

ReviewPress adds the following functions to WordPress:

  • Reviews as custom post type
  • Review categories
  • Review tags

Future versions

ReviewPress version 1.0 will contain the following functions:

  • Microformat support (hReview 0.3 support and support for Google Rich Snippets)
  • Link to the source of the review (like a product)
  • Your idea! (contact me through my site or via twitter: @ramoonus )
  • HTML 5 input fields
  • Amazon ASIN support for linking to a product
  • Optimised for the Genesis Framework
  • Shortcodes for quickly inserting a link to a review or a list of reviews
  • Search Engine Optimalisation
  • Readme screenshots

Disclaimer

  1. This plugin is not associates to ReviewPress or ReviewsPress named themes.
  2. This
